sentences: Joel Rundell (September 26, 1965 â€“ August 8, 1990) was an American musician best known as one of the four original members and lead guitarist of the Louisiana-based alternative rock band Better Than Ezra.
He and the other original members formed the group while attending Louisiana State University.
Rundell died by suicide on August 8, 1990, nearly a year after the release of the band's first album, Surprise.
After his death, the band went on hiatus before reuniting as a trio by the end of 1990.
In 2016, Rundell's family and former drummer Cary Bonnecaze sued the band.
Citing the 25th anniversary edition of Surprise, a remastered version, the contention was that Better Than Ezra did not have the right to re-release the album.
